name: Shiitake Showdown
description:
A parasitical race of Myconids has recently surfaced within the world, infecting and wiping out many civilisations. They desire to assimilate everything within their Mycelium network and create a dark world, shrouded in the shadow of their fungi so that they can live on the surface without fear of the light. However, their next target, a collection of cold-blooded Serpents are devout worshippers of the Sun and refuse to let this happen and will do everything in their power to prevent this threat from winning.

Unique weapons
Battle it out with your friends or foes using a variety of different weapons that each excel in their own scenario. Change from using a shotgun at close range to a sniper from afar to make the most of each weapons strong point.

Elemental utility
Utilise your power over the elements with 4 to chose from. Wield 2 of these elements at the same time to adapt depending on the situation. Each element suits a different playstyle so try them all and see what suits you best.

Diferent maps and game modes
With 4 different maps and 4 gamemodes to play on each of them play them all and find what combination is your favorite!

Customization
Change your caracter skin and color to suit your style. With loads of combinations to choose from there is something to suit everyone!
